item.title: Post-Tropical Cyclone MATTHEW Forecast/Advisory Number 46
item.description:
Issued at 1500 UTC SUN OCT 09 2016 
ZCZC MIATCMAT4 ALL
TTAA00 KNHC DDHHMM

POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE MATTHEW FORECAST/ADVISORY NUMBER  46
NWS NATIONAL HURRICANE CENTER MIAMI FL       AL142016
1500 UTC SUN OCT 09 2016

CHANGES IN WATCHES AND WARNINGS WITH THIS ADVISORY...

ALL HURRICANE WATCHES HAVE BEEN DISCONTINUED.

SUMMARY OF WATCHES AND WARNINGS IN EFFECT...

A TROPICAL STORM WARNING IS IN EFFECT FOR...
* CAPE FEAR TO DUCK
* PAMLICO AND ALBEMARLE SOUNDS

POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE CENTER LOCATED NEAR 35.2N  73.7W AT 09/1500Z
POSITION ACCURATE WITHIN  25 NM

PRESENT MOVEMENT TOWARD THE EAST OR  80 DEGREES AT  13 KT

ESTIMATED MINIMUM CENTRAL PRESSURE  984 MB
MAX SUSTAINED WINDS  65 KT WITH GUSTS TO  80 KT.
64 KT.......  0NE   0SE  60SW   0NW.
50 KT....... 40NE  60SE  90SW  90NW.
34 KT.......210NE 180SE 200SW 160NW.
12 FT SEAS..240NE 240SE 260SW  90NW.
WINDS AND SEAS VARY GREATLY IN EACH QUADRANT.  RADII IN NAUTICAL
MILES ARE THE LARGEST RADII EXPECTED ANYWHERE IN THAT QUADRANT.

REPEAT...CENTER LOCATED NEAR 35.2N  73.7W AT 09/1500Z
AT 09/1200Z CENTER WAS LOCATED NEAR 35.1N  74.4W

FORECAST VALID 10/0000Z 35.3N  71.2W...POST-TROP/EXTRATROP
MAX WIND  60 KT...GUSTS  75 KT.
50 KT... 40NE  60SE 100SW 120NW.
34 KT...210NE 180SE 220SW 240NW.

FORECAST VALID 10/1200Z 35.7N  68.0W...POST-TROP/EXTRATROP
MAX WIND  50 KT...GUSTS  60 KT.
50 KT...  0NE   0SE 100SW  80NW.
34 KT...180NE 180SE 200SW 200NW.

FORECAST VALID 11/0000Z 37.0N  64.0W...POST-TROP/EXTRATROP
MAX WIND  35 KT...GUSTS  45 KT.
34 KT...150NE 150SE 180SW 180NW.

FORECAST VALID 11/1200Z...ABSORBED BY FRONT

REQUEST FOR 3 HOURLY SHIP REPORTS WITHIN 300 MILES OF 35.2N  73.7W

NEXT ADVISORY AT 09/2100Z

$$
FORECASTER BROWN
item.author: jason.fleming@seahorsecoastal.com
